title: Friend gifted but its not there
body: My friend gifted me both Rakan and Xayah i got xayah gift notification and was able get her. However, my next gift notfication didnt let me click it and when league got closed the notification dissapeared so where is my gift ?

replies.body: It looks like your friend was able to send you Xayah, but he hasn't sent Rakan to you yet. It looks like he was able to buy Rakan for himself, which may have been an error on his end if he meant for it to be a gift. Double check with him, and if it was a mistake have him hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can look over that for him.
